name: Buddy's Redemption
description:
Get out of Hell!

Help Buddy in proving to the inhabitants of hell that he is the bestest of good Boys and that he deserves to go to Doggo Heaven!

After a failed attempt at a robbery, Doug tells his dog Buddy, that they are going to Hell! Knowing that Buddy is a good boy, he must now do whatever he can to show everyone how much of a good boy he is! Be it fetching balls or digging up bones, Buddy will stop at nothing to prove his point!

Controls
  • Z - to interact
  • Arrows or W/A/S/D to move
Features
  • Single-player narrative driven adventure game
  • Creative story-telling
Review
